clock - Variable in class AbstractMessage
Lamport clock to stamp the message
clock - Variable in class Process
Value of the Lamport clock, incremented when some events happen (sending or receiving messages mostly)
Com - Class in <Unnamed>
Class taking care of the messages in the bus It's a middleware to supply the guava library A Lamport object can check its messages through mailboxes
Com(Lamport) - Constructor for class Com
Constructor for Com
com - Variable in class Process
The object managing the communications with other processes Received messages can be found in its mailboxes
